comment: Euclid's Lemma (see ProofWiki "Euclid's Lemma", 10-Jul-2021, ~ https://proofwiki.org/wiki/Euclid's_Lemma ): If an integer divides the product of two integers and is coprime to one of them, then it divides the other. See also theorem 1.5 in [ApostolNT] p. 16. Generalization of ~ euclemma . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 22-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Jul-2021.)
